lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: America's criminal justice system is very fair and very accurate, but many people are still found guilty of crimes they didn't commit. I help local governments pass laws that make sure fewer innocent people go to prison.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can't even imagine how frustrating it would be for those people in poor countries who have an idea to break the poverty level, yet don't have that initial capital to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I fight spam.

lender.name: Emmie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: i love you

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: Kiva is fascinating

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: How could I not want to be part of the great good Kiva does in the world?
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher. My students are teenagers who are at-risk for a lot of bad stuff, the least of which might be never graduating from high school.

lender.name: SHER AND DREW
lender.loan_because: through Kiva, we can join a truly grass roots movement to deliver capital efficiently to those who would otherwise not have access by other means.

lender.name: Renu
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for everyone!

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I have traveled the world and have seen how much difference even a small amount of money can make to someone in a developing country.

lender.name: Siggi
lender.loan_because: By doing so I´m helping people to help them self and improve their quality of live. That will in the end make the world a better place for all of us

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can borrow.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer games.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to so I do. Plus, I feel with the manipulations and selfish hoarding the USA does under the guise of "helping" people I, as a citizen, attempt to undo some, if only a minute, amount.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Director of Debate, so I coach the college's debate team. Also, I teach Public Speaking, so I am an educator.

lender.name: Lewis
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me financially and I would like to help him bless others.
lender.occupational_info: Like Columbus, I sail the ocean too.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of small individual contributions collectively having a big impact on providing people with the opportunity to improve their lives and help their families.
lender.occupational_info: I write business news updates.

lender.name: Hugh Kennedy
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born into the First World.
lender.occupational_info: Helping leading life science, healthcare and technology companies bring breakthrough technologies to the world.

lender.name: Brad
lender.occupational_info: I work as an accountant with Bookkeepers of Austin, helping small businesses in the area to work with their budgets and fix their books.

lender.name: Steve K.
lender.loan_because: Having run a business for over 14 years, I have come to understand the power of cash flow. It takes money to make money, and sometimes a small loan is enough to cause the breakthrough needed to reach success. I can remember a day with my business when I had $6,000 in confirmed orders, but needed $2,000 in cash to release production. A generous person listened to my need, lent me the money and two weeks later I was able to repay and use the $4,000 profit to rebuild my cash flow. It made all the difference in the world!

lender.name: Pratush
lender.loan_because: to make a small difference..
lender.occupational_info: Develop marketing intelligence for a large company.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed, fortunate and have been given opportunities to make something of myself. I want to "pay it forward" so others can have that opportunity as well.
lender.occupational_info: I develop medical devices that diagnose and treat cardiac arrhythmia.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: So many people have helped me along the way. It's my turn to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the Controller at a commercial real estate company.

lender.name: Anners
lender.loan_because: I have seen through my travels that poverty around the world is entirely different than American "poverty."

lender.name: Yolanda
lender.loan_because: I love to help as much as I can

lender.name: Karola & Basha
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a "leg up", and trust KIVA for getting resources to where they are needed most around the globe!
lender.occupational_info: Twofold: Independent Distributor for an all-natural health supplement. PT Accountant/Administrative Type.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a good way to help small businesses get off the ground. Creo que esto es buena manera de ayudar a nuevos negocios pequeños.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Computer Science in a University. Enseño la ciencia de computación en la universidad.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: This isnt just about lending money, its about giving hope.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: While teaching school in the 1970's in Chipata, Zambia, I became involved in development activities and learned that most people need a helping hand now and again. The best way for economic progress in any country is to encourage individuals to be self-reliant. I hope these loans from Kiva assist people in doing just that.
lender.occupational_info: For over 30 years, I operated my own photography studio, creating portrait, wedding and commercial images. I retired in 2006.

lender.name: BMathew
lender.loan_because:
I need to pratice what I preach. We all need to start making change and not just talk about it. Do something! And hopefully, inspire others to do the same. Make a difference in the place you currently are.
"..you basically have two choices. On choice is to assume the worst, and then you can be guaranteed that it'll happen. The other is to assume that theres some hope for change, in which case its possible that you can help to effect change. So you've got two choices, one guarantees the worst will happen, the other leaves open the possibility that things might get better. Given those choices, a decent person doesn't hesitate." - N.Chomsky,
lender.occupational_info: IT

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to see a dream become reality. I'm not a wealthy person but I am humbled into believing we should help each other as best we can. I hope someone would reach out to me in a time of need as I have chosen to reach out to others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a nurse. I heal... or at least attempt to heal those who are sick. I drive a smart car... which is ozone friendly and I recycle. I try to do my part. :)

lender.name: HUU
lender.loan_because: I would like to open a restaurant in Hoi An ancient town - one of the world heritage sites in Vietnam. lender.occupational_info: I am working in Hoi An Tourist Service Joint Stock Company as a sales executive.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.loan_because: We want to help
lender.occupational_info: Average American family.

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.occupational_info: I do G programming for an electronics company

lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help someone.

lender.name: John Brian
lender.occupational_info: I'm a composer and performer of electronic music.

lender.loan_because: I believe in doing good for others - there is somehow hope for mankind.
lender.occupational_info: Ach, its just sharing.

lender.occupational_info: I am currently a full time student majoring in History and International Studies. My particular area of interest is international environmental policy and development.

lender.name: Ruth

lender.occupational_info: God gave me the talent to teach children. I teach 2nd grade students and have been teaching for 35 years. If I can help others to reach their dreams then I am living my life for the glory of God.

lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of entrepreneurship, it changes people's lives.

lender.name: Mindee

lender.name: Erik

lender.occupational_info: I love my job! Helping others, including children, is something I greatly enjoy.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I can't do anything about the big picture. It amazes me how much one person can do for another, and, if enough of us do this, the world will be much kinder.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Lorne

lender.name: Esacar Jr.
lender.loan_because: I started an emergency care training services business in Cebu Philippines. I have some training equipment but dont have a training venue. Im looking for a small space for training area. I would like to make a loan so I could find a place to rent and pay advance rental requirements. and also purchase new manikins and AED trainers. Can I apply for a loan of 1,000 USD?
lender.occupational_info: I am a trained EMT Instructor by rescue 911 USA and an EMT Assessor for Australasia (www.aremt.com click assess coord, Philippines) Im in the Philippines and have started emergency training services on my own. I have purchased some training manikins and other training materials. I need to loan so I could use it for 3 months rental find a decent place for an office and training area. As an Instructor trainer for ECSI -American Academy of Orthopaedic Surgeons, I have trained 6 Registered Nurses in the Philippines as my Staff Instructors. I want to help develop the EMS System in Cebu City. Please help me with my Project. see (www.ecsinstitute.org) click international skills center, Philippines)

lender.name: Chris and Kristy

lender.loan_because:
My family was poor when I was a child, and through hard work, education and dedication I am now well off. I can attest that education is the answer to poverty. This is one of the greatest ideas that I have ever seen. By funding these people, they may in turn do well for themselves and be able to afford to give their children an education, thereby breaking the cycle of poverty.
Imagine if everyone who could in the world, gave just a small fraction of their income, or a few hours of their time to help others. Imagine what the world could be.

lender.name: Zorre
lender.loan_because: IIn 2004 zijn we gestart met restaurant Tacos, gefinancierd met een banklening. In arme landen is het vaak moeilijk of onmogelijk om een lening te krijgen. Huiseigendom is vaak niet gedocumenteerd, zodat dit niet als onderpand kan dienen. Einde aan armoede begint bij kleine startups, en niet zoals de overheid denkt, met giften aan arme landen. De beste manier om kleine bedrijven te stimuleren is door het makkelijker te maken geld te lenen. Niet door ze geld te geven! Gratis geld wordt nou eeenmaal niet goed besteed. Kortom, als iedereen een paar euro wegzet om uit te lenen zal de welvaart stijgen in die arme landen. Het mooie is, als een bedrijfje zijn lening heeft betaald, kan je het geld hergebruiken om nog meer bedrijven te steunen!

lender.loan_because: this is real people in need of real money to do a real service to the people around them.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and software.

So I have expirience of working with kinds and want to help parents and kids by basing the kindergarten. I already bought some materials. So I will appriciate your help with money for renting place.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: People know best how to help themselves. International aid organizations can do some good in times of dire emergency, but often are hindered by misplaced resources, administrative costs, and politics. lender.occupational_info: I help communities create large site-specific pageants and processions. Working in close collaboration with local residents, I create original festival events – using giant puppets, masks and costumes, and mobile architecture – that celebrate and preserve local narratives, myths, and everyday histories.

lender.occupation: Marketing manager (For a dot com company)

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: It's very clever, very necessary, and I thought it was important to do.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It helps people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Using mathematics, and special codes for computers, I instruct computers to calculate and show information that is used by scientists, businesses and the government.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: It leverages my giving

lender.name: Lincoln
lender.occupational_info: S/W Engineer

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to help others directly without the bureaucracy that accompanies helping people in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: Project management of software that secures the Internet.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do! How often do you get the chance to do something that will make a positive, direct impact on the lives of those who live overseas?
lender.occupational_info: I am the material and logistics officer for a squadron of three Navy ships.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to pass on a better world to my 2 girls and improve the lives of other children around the world. This is a photo of my little Elizabeth.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a small, home based business that embroiders garments for resale. David does the creative work and I manage the shop and maintain the machines and stock.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I HAVE BEEN SO BLESSED!

lender.name: Kim & Hayden
lender.loan_because:
I think it's important to give a hand up, particularly to other women (and other parents), whenever we can. It's only by sheer, dumb luck that my family was born where we were and have had some of the opportunities that we have. It's our responsibility to share that good fortune as much as we can.
For the past four years, my daughter, Hayden (age 7), has helped me choose who we loan money to. She loves hearing the stories, particularly when the people have young children, and is developing a social conscience at a very early age!
lender.occupational_info: I work in corporate sponsorship. I assist companies to make good decisions about how to spend their money. I also write books and teach companies how to spend their sponsorship money wisely, as well as teaching organisations how to raise money.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I admire those who ask for help and work hard to improve their situations.
lender.occupational_info: I help reduce the overhead of non-profits and community clinics by assisting in price negotiations for medical supplies and pharmaceutical products.

lender.name: Jane Lillian
lender.loan_because: empowering entrepreneurs is more proactive than charity. It is exciting to see micro businesses thrive!

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: We love to give directly rather than to a large anonymous organization. Even though we can't afford to give large amounts, we can do something.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired and live in a motorhome traveling the USA and Canada.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I think it is an awesome opportunity to make a real difference somewhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school history.

lender.name: krishnakumar
lender.loan_because: Every day I wake up, I think of those who are trying to do their best for them and their family and would like to extend my little help to make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physicist and I work on modeling and simulation

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: I like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Driving a bus is a lot like herding sheep or goats.

lender.name: Buck
lender.loan_because: i believe it is good to do
lender.occupational_info: I write music for movies.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: The Lord jesus has given me everything I have, love, peace, true happiness, health, life, ect., how can I not help those he loves as he expects me to.
lender.occupational_info: I install the interior of the Boeing 747

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: of my global, social responsability to give to those in need. I am just "paying it forward"

lender.name: Jamelah Usama Al-Taher
lender.loan_because: God didn't give me anything to keep. He gives to me so that I may give to others. They are receiving the love of Jesus even if they don't know Him.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of 5 wonderful daughters. I also work for a television station.

lender.name: Chun
lender.loan_because: a small loan from us, a great future to them

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Well, I wanted to do something to help :O I felt that microloans suited my style. I'm a student so I need money for school and stuff, the fact that I get it back is great because I can lend it out to someone else again (it's like a renewable charity donation!), but I can also lend it to myself if I find myself in some financial trouble, and then just as easily put it back into Kiva :) I think it would be cool to have thousands invested all over the world in the next few years :)
lender.occupational_info: Well. I'm just a student. I get odd jobs, but I save like you wouldn't believe >.>...I'm also hoping to get some money from my art or writing sometime in the near future :)

lender.name: diana
lender.loan_because: everyone derserves to live the life they want to live. GO KIVA!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Senior Producer at Fisher Price, a toy company. I work in the content design department and make interactive games and toys for preschoolers.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to spread as much entrepreneurial spirit and support as I can. I am also a huge fan of the work KIVA is doing around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are or want to be joyfully jobless. I lead seminars on inspired entrepreneurship, publish a self-employment newsletter and am the author of Making a Living Without a Job. Nothing excites me more than seeing someone succeed in their own small business.

lender.name: Xiuming
lender.loan_because: It is a great business to help poor people, and also to help ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: Try to set up a organiztion like Kiva and Grameen Bank.

lender.name: Grace Missions Committee
lender.loan_because: I have made these donations on behalf of the Grace United Methodist Church - Missions & Social Concerns Committee - in Denver, Colorado.
lender.occupational_info: My profession is in the field of education. I also volunteer with the Missions & Social Concerns Committee at my church in Denver, Colorado.

lender.name: AMRA
lender.loan_because: Even from a little like I have there is a little extra to share. So, I share and I love it, especially seeing that it helps.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Kiva connects microlenders to people that need credit the most. It empowers people to pursue an entrepreneurial dream, with the ultimate goal of becoming more self-sufficient. The stories and photos truly say it all -culturally rich, rewarding and inspiring!!
